Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The user wants me to create a DuckDB SQL query for process mining event log analysis Let me break down the requirements 1 The table is named event_log 2 Columns case_id activity timestamp 3 Goal Filter out cases with more than 6 events 4 Return events only from cases with 6 events total

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The approach 1 First identify case_ids that have 6 events 2 Then filter the original table to only include those case_ids

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Ill write a query using a subquery or CTE to count events per case and then filter accordingly

Name: Validation - PE
